unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhai! Must for us farmers, especially with unpredictable monsoons. Heard Maharashtra farmers benefited a lot last year.
normalised: Crop insurance, bhai! Must for us farmers, especially with unpredictable monsoons. Heard Maharashtra farmers benefited a lot last year. My neighbor, Ramesh, got a good payout after that hailstorm in Nagpur. Thinking of insuring my paddy for the coming Kharif season. Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana zindabad! But paperwork is a pain, ya! Need to celebrate with Biryani after a good harvest. Onam wishes to all farmer families! Hopefully, less jhanjhat this time around with claim settlements. Rupee two thousand per acre seems reasonable.

unnormalised: My neighbor, Ramesh, got a good payout after that hailstorm in Nagpur.
Thinking of insuring my paddy for the coming Kharif season.
Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana zindabad!
But paperwork is a pain, ya! Need to celebrate with Biryani after a good harvest.
Onam wishes to all farmer families!
Hopefully, less jhanjhat this time around with claim settlements.
